bio_excerpt.label: Bio Excerpt
bio_excerpt.value: Certified coach, author, and speaker focused on transforming lives through practical guidance and authentic connection.

quote.label: Quote
quote.value: Monica's coaching completely transformed my approach to challenges. I went from feeling overwhelmed to having a clear action plan.

quote.label: Quote
quote.value: The 8-step framework gave me the structure I needed to finally launch my business. Monica's guidance was invaluable.

quote.label: Quote
quote.value: Monica helped me gain clarity on my career path and gave me the confidence to make a major life change successfully.

description.label: Description
description.value: Download my free Action Guide and start your journey from doubtful to decisive today.

tagline.label: Tagline
tagline.value: Dream It. Plan It. Do It. Live It!

section_1_content.label: Section 1 Content
section_1_content.value: One of 10 children, I learned early the power of connection, communication, and finding your unique voice in the crowd.

section_2_content.label: Section 2 Content
section_2_content.value: Married to Steve for 37 years, I raised three children and am now a proud grandmother, always learning from life's transitions.

section_3_content.label: Section 3 Content
section_3_content.value: Founded New Steps Life Coaching in 2007, passionate about helping others navigate life's challenges and opportunities.

credential_1.label: PCC Certification
credential_1.value: Professional Certified Coach (PCC) - International Coaching Federation

philosophy_quote.label: Philosophy Quote
philosophy_quote.value: I believe everyone has the answers within them ‚Äì sometimes you just need a skilled partner to help you uncover them.

book_subtitle.label: Book Subtitle
book_subtitle.value: Eight Steps to Get Unstuck and Take Action

main_description.label: Main Description
main_description.value: Are you tired of feeling stuck, overwhelmed, or paralyzed by doubt? In this transformative guide, I'll equip you with the tools and strategies to cultivate an empowered mindset, declare your aspirations, and chart a clear path to achieve them.

step_1_description.label: Step 1 Description
step_1_description.value: Recognize where you are and what needs to change

step_2_description.label: Step 2 Description
step_2_description.value: Face your challenge head-on without judgment

step_3_description.label: Step 3 Description
step_3_description.value: Shift your perspective to empower action

step_5_description.label: Step 5 Description
step_5_description.value: Create your strategic roadmap to success

step_6_description.label: Step 6 Description
step_6_description.value: Turn dreams into reality with decisive steps

testimonial_quote.label: Testimonial Quote
testimonial_quote.value: Doubtful to Decisive is like having your own professional coach. Monica's wisdom, paired with practical exercises, creates a powerful combination for transformation.

page_title.label: Page Title
page_title.value: Transform Your Life with Personal Coaching

tagline.label: Tagline
tagline.value: From Doubtful & Uncertain to Decisive & Crystal Clear

testimonial_1.label: Testimonial 1
testimonial_1.value: Monica helped me transition from corporate to launching my own successful consulting business.

testimonial_2.label: Testimonial 2
testimonial_2.value: I gained clarity on my values and landed a leadership role that aligns perfectly.

testimonial_3.label: Testimonial 3
testimonial_3.value: Coaching helped us reconnect, improve communication, and create a shared vision.

testimonial_4.label: Testimonial 4
testimonial_4.value: Mental Fitness coaching transformed how I handle stress and challenges.

tagline.label: Tagline
tagline.value: Develop Your Coaching Skills & Build Your Practice with Confidence

definition_text.label: Definition
definition_text.value: Mentor coaching is a professional development process where experienced coaches guide emerging coaches to mastery.

tagline.label: Tagline
tagline.value: Accelerate Your Success Through the Power of Community

definition_text.label: Mastermind Definition
definition_text.value: A mastermind brings together a small group of driven individuals who meet regularly to tackle challenges, set ambitious goals, and hold each other accountable.

napoleon_hill_quote.label: Napoleon Hill Quote
napoleon_hill_quote.value: No mind is complete by itself. It needs contact and association with other minds to grow and expand.

testimonial_1.label: Testimonial 1
testimonial_1.value: The mastermind transformed my business approach. Collective wisdom helped me 3x revenue in 6 months.

testimonial_2.label: Testimonial 2
testimonial_2.value: As a solopreneur, this gave me a board of advisors who truly care about my success.

guarantee_text.label: Guarantee Text
guarantee_text.value: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. If you attend all sessions and don't see significant progress, we'll work with you until you do.

tagline.label: Tagline
tagline.value: Certified Life Coach, Author, and Speaker helping you get unstuck and take action.

response_time_answer.value: I typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days.

coaching_type_question.label: Coaching Type Question
coaching_type_question.value: Do you offer in-person or virtual coaching?

coaching_type_answer.label: Coaching Type Answer
coaching_type_answer.value: I offer virtual coaching via Zoom to serve clients worldwide.

consultation_question.label: Consultation Question
consultation_question.value: Do you offer a free consultation?

consultation_answer.label: Consultation Answer
consultation_answer.value: Yes, I offer a complimentary 30-minute discovery call to see if we're a good fit.

international_question.label: International Question
international_question.value: Do you work with international clients?

international_answer.label: International Answer
international_answer.value: Absolutely! I work with clients across different time zones worldwide.
